item.description:
Hello, it's Josh,

 

We will be enjoying dinner at Fire and Ice, if you'd care to join us. 
Fire and Ice is one of my favorite restaurants, and the Fra Diavolo is my favorite.

 

We will be celebrating the launch of our popular new community

Imagine Adventures

Learn more: http://www.meetup.com/Imagine-Adventures/

 

We anticipate adventuring with you, :)
Josh and fellow Adventurers

 

Life is an adventure...Will you join us?

 

P.S. Learn more or discover who else is coming:

http://www.meetup.com/ImagineAdventures/events/94991742/
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess for us. I'll provide my cell phone number closer to the time - for your convenience. :)
item.name: Celebrate. Eat. Meet new friends. Discover...
